item.title: GraphViz in Markdown
item.description: Quick method to embed GraphViz in Markdown documents.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Jacob! I grew up in Saint Louis, Missouri and graduated from the University of Minnesota, Twin Cities with a B.S. in Computer Science. I previously worked at an early-stage startup in San Francisco and a bootstrapped software-as-a-service company in the Midwest. I currently work for Facebook in Menlo Park as a Production Engineer. I raced road bicycles from 2012 to 2019 and still ride recreationally. My GitHub account is @oko.

item.title: Reading
item.description: This is a loosely categorized list of good reading material. Technology Linux Kernel The Definitive Guide to Linux System Calls BPF Portability and CO-RE Organizational Management Why Does DARPA Work?
